text: House Calls is a 1978 American comedy movie directed by Howard Zieff and starring Walter Matthau, Glenda Jackson, Richard Benjamin, Art Carney, Candice Azzara, Dick O'Neill. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and was spun off into a television series in 1979. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Zieff Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies adapted into television series
title: House Calls (movie)
